FROM ubuntu:xenial
ENV HOSTNAME=opcua
ARG http_proxy
ARG https_proxy
ENV http_proxy=${http_proxy}
ENV https_proxy=${https_proxy}

WORKDIR /root/
RUN apt-get -y update
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y dialog apt-utils software-properties-common && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN add-apt-repository ppa:mosquitto-dev/mosquitto-ppa
RUN apt-get -y update
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y --fix-broken \
    python3.5 \
    curl \
    zip \
    vim \
    rabbitmq-server \
    mosquitto \
    mosquitto-clients \
    git \
    gawk && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python3-pip python-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir enum34==1.1.6
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir trollius==2.2
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir dateutils==0.6.6
RUN pip3 --default-timeout=100 --no-cache-dir install opcua==0.90.4
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir amqpstorm==2.4.0
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir cryptography==2.1.4
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir supervisor==3.3.4

COPY rabbitmq-env.conf /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-env.conf
COPY rabbitmq.config /etc/rabbitmq/
COPY entrypoint.sh /root/
COPY supervisord.conf /root/
RUN chmod +x /root/entrypoint.sh
RUN mkdir /var/log/opcua/
RUN touch /var/log/opcua/opcua_converter.log
RUN git clone https://github.com/intel/Converter-for-OPCUA.git

ENTRYPOINT ["/root/entrypoint.sh"]

ONBUILD RUN rm -rf /root/*

WORKDIR /root/
